reviewText: AMERICAN QUILTER is produced by the American Quilter's Society and is a marvelous collection of all 13 episodes of the first season recorded on four DVDs. The host is Jeanna Juleson, each episode features an American Quilter interview, a demonstration with our co-host and Savvy Quilter, a focus on one great Quilt of the Week, on the road with Quiltscapes to visit a national quilting event, and Pieceful Quilter to wrap up a moment in time and place. American Quilter: Episodes One, Two & Three American Quilter Series Episodes Four, Five & Six American Quilter Series Episodes Seven Eight Nine American Quilter Series Episodes Ten, Eleven, Twelve, Thirteen
